content.description: Start on the lower ground with a RH pinch and a LH crimp on the rail. Make crimpy moves up and left to larger holds at the face. Decent crimpy warm up. The downclimb is done by either hopping onto the boulder to the left and then hopping down to the pads or by downclimbing to the landing.
content.location: Just past the enormous boulder, the problem faces north up the gully.

content.description: Has my vote for one of the best V2s on the mountain. Start matched on a jug and move out to an awesome rail. Top out either straight up through the huecos or a spicy slab top out to the left.
content.protection: You can pad it but it won't help much. Keep a cool head.
content.location: On the backside of The Pebbles, facing downhill.

content.description: Sit start with right hand on giant rounded gaston and left on the arete.  Climb up to a good crimp rail and make a couple more moves to top out on good holds.There is a lower start with a right hand gaston/pinch for one extra move, not much more difficult.
content.location: In The Pebbles area.  Located on the opposite side of the boulder as Laser Salad.  Follows the white arete.

content.description: This is the central hub of The Secret Gulley, just past Enormous Boulder.
